page.title: 10HOUSING RENOVATION PROGRAMME
page.content: The area of Knightsridge in Livingston is due for a complete renovation programme. Recently the Livingston Development Corporation has been moving people out of their homes while work is being done to improve the area. New central heating systems have been installed and wall insulation has been provided. Internal walls have been knocked down and replaced with thicker walls made of a different material to counteract condensation. Many houses which were built in a square formation are too close together and some of these are being knocked down to open up the squares and give the residents more space around their homes. Although there will be some disruption to the residents it is hoped that in the future Knightsridge will be an area to be proud of.
